Package org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser

Class ConnectionWithControls

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.browser.ConnectionWithControls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public final class ConnectionWithControls
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Associates a ConnectionWrapper with the LDAP Controls it should use when performing operation.

    The relevant controls are automatically added to the request when calling add(AddRequest), delete(DeleteRequest), modify(ModifyRequest), modifyDN(ModifyDNRequest), search(SearchRequest) or searchSingleEntry(SearchRequest).

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionWrapper

        public ConnectionWrapper getConnectionWrapper()
        Returns the connection wrapper.

        DO NOT USE TO PERFORM LDAP OPERATIONS!

        This getter is only used to allow to query its state.

        Returns:
        the read-only connection wrapper.
